comment:
>>37761684

"Looks like it's lost a bit of durability," she says, "But it's alright. Weapons are hard to break, and they let you know when they're broken. I can repair it for you later, if you can't find anyone else to."

"Do you guys know what your hidden skills do?" You ask.

"Hidden...?" Tatsumaki checks her UI.

"I don't know what you're talking about." Vision says.

"Yeah, I've got an unknown ability in my menu..." You assumed someone would know; now, you hesitate to tell them about your experience with the NPC, how it glitched when you tried to show it off. "Maybe some sort of glitch?"

"Uhm, could be." Ayla gives you a strange look. The conversation stalls.

> Continue into the ruins; see if you can't scope the place out.
> Discuss strategy.
> Other. (Write-in.)
